category.name: Manufacturing

preference.name: MENEWMFG_DefaultDatumJTDatasetName
preference.preference_description: Specifies the name of the JT dataset that is attached by default to every newly created datum at import. Valid Values: The Teamcenter business object type, followed by the control direction and dataset name, in the following format: type:control_direction:datasetname
